Title: link2rail
error-403: You are not authorized. Please log in first.
restricted-page: This site is available only for loged in user
TRAIN_TOO_LATE: Train is more than 60 minutes late
TRAIN_LATE: Train is less than 60 minutes late

Home.Empty-wagon-text: Send us your empty wagon requests and access order templates.
Home.Order-management-text: Assign your transports using order templates.
Home.Track-trace-text: Check the location of your shipments.
Home.Train-management-text: Get an overview of your train schedule and track your trains. Additionally, you can book or cancel trains.
Home.list-view-text: Get an overview of your entire train programme, use the tracking options and make cancellations.
Home.calendar-view-text: Get a calendar overview of your entire train programme, use the tracking options and make cancellations.
Home.week-view-text: Get a weekly calendar overview of your entire train programme, use the tracking options and make cancellations.
Home.month-view-text: Get a monthly calendar overview of your entire train programme, use the tracking options and make cancellations.
Home.orders-list-text: Get an overview of your orders, cancellations and quantity reductions incl. status update and make orders and cancellations.
Home.order-templates-text: Get an overview of your order templates and place DBflextrain orders.

Details.First-line: Thank you for wanting to give us feedback. The participation is voluntary
Details.Second-line: Technical Cookies are set. Further Infromation can be found in our
Details.First-hint-text: Please note: You will not receive a response to your feedback.
Details.Second-hint-text: Please do not provide any personal data such as name, order number, etc.

System-information-component.Support-text: On this page you will find helpful documentation on the subject of link2rail Portal. If you have any further questions, please do not hesitate to contact link2rail-support on 00800 5555 4433 Monday to Friday from 7 a.m. to 4 p.m. or at link2rail@deutschebahn.com.
